description: Carrot Hosting is a project that aims to provide a fully automated, anonymous and secure web hosting platform on Tor Network to everyone who believes in freedom of speech and online privacy. We want to help revolutionize the society by allowing people to build alternative web content and circumvent censorship all around the world.
name: Carrot Hosting
